settings.subtitle: Partnership Program
settings.heading: Become a Partner
settings.text: Join the Aurowe dealer network and bring Nordic wellness to your customers. We provide premium hot and cold tubs backed by exceptional craftsmanship, competitive margins, and dedicated partner support.

settings.subtitle: Why Partner With Us
settings.heading: A Partnership Built on Quality
settings.text: Aurowe tubs are handcrafted from sustainably sourced Nordic thermowood, designed to last decades. As a partner, you represent a brand customers trust â€” backed by 25+ years of Scandinavian craftsmanship. We equip you with everything you need to succeed: product training, marketing assets, and a dedicated account manager who understands your market.

settings.heading: Competitive Margins
settings.text: Attractive wholesale pricing with volume-based tier discounts that grow as your business grows.

settings.heading: Exclusive Territory
settings.text: Protected sales territories ensure you are the sole Aurowe representative in your region.

settings.heading: Drop Shipping Available
settings.text: We handle logistics and ship directly to your customers, so you can focus on selling.

settings.heading: Marketing Support
settings.text: Access to professional product photography, brochures, digital assets, and co-branded marketing materials.

settings.heading: Product Training
settings.text: Comprehensive onboarding and ongoing training on our full product range, installation, and maintenance.

settings.heading: International Reach
settings.text: Join a growing network of partners across Europe and beyond with dedicated regional support.

settings.heading: Partnership Perks
settings.subheading: Everything you need to grow your wellness business.

settings.text: Becoming an Aurowe partner is straightforward. Fill out the inquiry form below with details about your business, and our partnership team will review your application within 5 business days. Once approved, you will receive access to our partner portal, wholesale pricing, and a dedicated account manager to help you launch.

settings.heading: Partner Inquiry
settings.text: Tell us about your business and how you would like to partner with Aurowe. We will be in touch shortly.
settings.success_message: Thank you for your interest in partnering with Aurowe. Our team will review your application and contact you within 5 business days.
